column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////With all the good Spanish places in the city
column2: I don't understand how this one is still in business. Seriously
column3: I'm probably too used to good restaurants
column4: but this one is disgusting. And I don't think it's a matter of taste
column6: it's a matter of quality! More or less all Spanish restaurants offer the same things and i have been to quite a few to be able to compare and tell the difference. I went there for the second time
column7: first time I didn't like it
column8: but I was willing to give it another chance. Done
column9: they won't see me and my friends anymore.
